artist: Artist: Rodney Ripps; Fabricator: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Dr. Glen D. Nelson
description: An edition of 10 was planned but never realized. In addition to 'The Centaur', Ripps produced two other multiples at Vermillion, 'The Triumph' (1982-83), and 'Athena" (1982-83), planned as editions of 10 and 12, respectively. However, neither was ever editioned, and there are no examples in the archive.
medium: Epoxy resin, walnut, copper tubing, acrylic, and enamel paint
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Steven M. Andersen, Minneapolis; Dr. Glen A. Nelson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
title: The Centaur
